head.title: Owens-Illinois reports earnings for Qtr to Dec 31

hedline.hl1: Owens-Illinois reports earnings for Qtr to Dec 31

block.p: b-Included $ 5.7 million of noncash expenses for the current-quarter effects of adopting two new accounting standards in the quarter and the year included a one-time gain of $ 17.8 million from sale of the compay's Japanese table glassware associate in 1991. Also included in the year is an extraordinary charge from early extinguishment of debt of $ 31,500,000 and a charge from an accounting adjustment of $ 199,400,000. c-Net loss d-After income from discontinued operations of $ 36,900,000, or 75 cents a share, in the quarter and the year included a loss of $ 120,100,000 from discontinued operations which included earnings of $ 3 million, or 7 cents a share, on discontinued Health Care segment; a loss of $ 123.1 million on disposal of the segment; an extraordinary charge of $ 143,500,000 from early extinguishment of debt in both the quarter and year, and the 1991 loss also included a $ 11 million gain as a result of an insurance settlement expenses for the current-quarter effects of adopting two new accounting standards. Year-ago results are restated to reflect the Health Care segment, which was sold in October 1991, as a discontinued operation.
